headline: Trade Desk’s Ventura CTV Ecosystem Tests Strength Of Independent Model
summary: The Trade Desk has launched its Ventura Ecosystem, a new collaboration aimed at creating a more transparent and revenue optimized marketplace for programmatic CTV advertising. Initial participants include major TV operating systems and global ad tech platforms, all using The Trade Desk’s identity and transparency tools. The move is intended to support more trusted and efficient CTV ad transactions across advertisers, content owners, and technology partners. For investors watching...
